title: Which evidence environment play role in intelligen

content.question: Which of the following is the best evidence that environment plays a role in intelligence?

choices.label: Identical twins reared together are more similar than identical twins reared apart.
Identical twins reared apart are more similar than fraternal twins reared together.
Fraternal twins reared together are more similar than unrelated individuals reared together.
Unrelated individuals reared together are less similar than siblings reared together.

content.answer: Identical twins reared together are more similar than identical twins reared apart.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
